name: Symphony (itch) (Beta)
description:
This is "Symphony", my entry for the jam made in 7 hours with Unity.

Learn how to play Fur Elise, the famous masterpiece by Beethoven.

The game is getting faster and faster everytime you complete the symphony!

CONTROLS

Keys Q, W, E, R, T, Y, A, S, D, F, G, H : Play A Note

Time to become a classical music legend!

HOW I MADE THE GAME
